reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater has a nice fit and appreciate its quality and comfort, noting it's not scratchy or uncomfortable.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit and flattering
items.body: Great fit. Super comfortable. Highly recommend Read more
items.author: Rebecca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shirt
items.body: Cute sweater. I think it runs alittle on the large size. Read more
items.author: Lisa M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Honest Sizing Review!!!!
items.body: I ordered this in two colors in size medium. I usually wear a size small at every other store I shop at and size 4 jeans. It seemed like a lot of people around my size were ordering a medium, this was my first time ordering clothes from Amazon so I thought maybe things ran small. Right now I’m 139 lbs, 5’8”, 34 DD I have gained some weight over the summer, but I’m still wearing size 4 in jeans and dresses and size small in shirts. I tried the shirts on, the first was the gray one, it was not tight, not really loose, the v-neck showed a lot of cleavage. It was looser then I’d normally wear, but not so baggy that it was hanging on me. I could fit a thin shirt under it. The next was green. For some reason that one seemed very loose and baggy, I didn’t like the way it looked at all. I measured it with the other shirt and it was a little bigger. I kept the gray and exchanged the green for a small. If you want a looser fit size up, but you might have to wear a cami or tank top under it the v neck does dip far. I’m going to suggest ordering the size you normally wear at other stores. If you don’t like your belly/ hip area and are trying to hide it, then consider ordering a medium. I’m guessing the small will be more fitted. If you are around my weight and have larger upper arms that you are sensitive about, a medium might be best. But the armpit area was pretty baggy on me. I hate my butt and thighs! So I’m only trying to help, I know they say love yourself as you are and you should!!! But it’s nice to know how clothes will fit on certain areas. If you decide to get this item I hope this review helps and I hope you look beautiful when you put it on! Oh at 5’8” it was just short of covering my butt if I wore leggings. Read more
items.author: Lua78

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top
items.body: Comfy and cute.fits great. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fitted almost thermal not sweater
items.body: This is not a sweater. It's barely the thickness of a thermal. Color wasn't this bright either. I did like the fit as it's long enough for me as a 6'2" lady with long arms. Read more
items.author: Julie A Mitchell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Neck shirt
items.body: Nice fit. Flattering style. Soft material. Read more
items.author: Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find
items.body: Super cute- just like the picture. Thicker than I thought it would be. Made well. Fits like the picture. Read more
items.author: Johanna S. Roberts

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Crap material
items.body: This is a very hard, scratchy material and I can tell will not soften in the wash. I am disappointed in all the good reviews seeing thats why I purchased the top but either they don't mind horrible material against their skin or they all received a totally different shirt. Material is thin and far from soft. I will be returning this top and I highly DO NOT recommend it. Definetly poor quality all-around. Even if this shirt was on sale for $5 I would tell ypu its not worth it. Very cheap quality .material and not worth the price. Save your time & money and look elsewhere. Read more
items.author: bstn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Orange, Brick Red, Light Blue, Red, White, Yellow, Light Pink, Green, Grey, Light Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
